text: This list is of the Cultural Properties of Japan designated in the categories of and for the Prefecture of Ehime. ==National Cultural Properties== ===Calligraphic works and classical texts=== As of 1 July 2015, three Important Cultural Properties have been designated, being of national significance. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%;" |- !width="25%" align="left" | Property
